Class Coverage

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.coverage.Coverage

public class Coverage
extends java.lang.Object

A coverage is a set of adjacent polygons build from a FeatureCollection.

setAdjustableCoordinates

public void setAdjustableCoordinates(java.util.Set adjustableCoords)
Sets the coordinates which can be adjusted. This allows precise control over which coordinates can be adjusted. For instance, coordinates which are known to be in matched segments can be prevented from being adjusted.

Parameters:
adjustableCoords - a Set of the coordinates which can be adjusted
